title: BREAKING: Kim Jong-un 'FIRES ballistic missile'
text:
DS/GETTY TAKE COVER: Kim Jong-un believed to have fired nuclear-capable missile 
The Tubby Tyrant has carried out his threat to fire a ballistic missile in his New Year's address, sparking fear of nuclear war. 
Military sources believe a missile was fired from the Hermit Kingdom towards the east, where donald Trump is currently meeting Japanese President Shinzo Abe to discuss the rogue nation.. 
The type of missile, launched from the northern town Banghyeon, is not known. Inside North Korea: The pictures Kim Jong-un doesn't want you to see Tuesday, 13th December 2016 Since 2008, photographer Eric Lafforgue ventured to North Korea six times. Thanks to digital memory cards, he was able to save photos that was forbidden to take inside the segregated state 1 / 62 Eric Lafforgue/Exclusivepix Medi Taking pictures in the DMZ is easy, but if you come too close to the soldiers, they stop you 
A source said: "The military is determining if the missile is the Musudan intermediate-range ballistic missile." 
The Musudan missile is estimated to have a range of about 3,000 kilometers. 
Kim has threatened to fire this missile directly at the US "anywhere, anytime".
